question: How do I register for an event?
answer: Visit the Events section, select your event, and click 'Register.' Complete the required details to finish registration.

question: How do I sign up for CampVerse?
answer: Welcome! To sign up, just click the 'Register' button on our homepage and fill in your details. We're excited to have you join our community!

question: Is CampVerse free to use?
answer: Yes! CampVerse is free for all users. Some events may have entry fees, but browsing and joining the platform is always free.

question: Can I get help if I'm stuck?
answer: Absolutely! If you ever need help, just reach out via our Support page or chat with us here. We're always happy to assist you!

question: What should I do if I can't find my certificate?
answer: No worries! Certificates are usually available in your dashboard after the event. If you can't find yours, contact support and we'll help you out.

question: How do I change my password?
answer: To change your password, go to your profile settings and select 'Change Password.' If you forgot your password, use the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page.

question: Can I participate if I'm new to coding?
answer: Of course! CampVerse welcomes everyone, whether you're a beginner or an expert. Many events are designed for all skill levels.

question: How do I contact a team member?
answer: You can message your team members directly from your dashboard or use the chat feature during events.

question: What happens after I register for an event?
answer: After registering, you'll receive a confirmation email and see the event in your dashboard. We'll keep you updated with all the important details!

question: Can I join more than one team?
answer: You can only join one team per event, but you're welcome to participate in multiple events with different teams!

question: What are the rules for the upcoming hackathon?
answer: Rules are available on the event details page or in the official rulebook linked there.

question: When is the deadline for the coding competition?
answer: Deadlines are listed on each event page under 'Important Dates.'

question: Where can I find the results of the last event?
answer: Results are posted on the Results page and sent to registered participants via email.

question: Who is eligible to participate?
answer: Eligibility criteria are shown on each event’s details page.

question: How do I form a team?
answer: You can invite users to join your team during registration or from your dashboard.

question: What are the prizes?
answer: Prize details are available on the event page under 'Prizes.'

question: How do I reset my password?
answer: Go to the login page and click 'Forgot Password' to receive reset instructions.

question: How do I contact support?
answer: Use the Support page or submit a ticket from your dashboard.

question: Can I edit my registration details?
answer: Yes, you can update your registration from your dashboard before the event deadline.

question: How do I upload required documents?
answer: Upload documents via the event registration form or your dashboard.

question: Where can I find event schedules?
answer: Schedules are listed on each event’s details page.

question: How do I verify my participation?
answer: Verification details are sent via email and shown on your dashboard after the event.

question: What is the process for certificate generation?
answer: Certificates are generated after event completion and can be downloaded from your dashboard.

question: How do I report a problem or bug?
answer: Use the Feedback or Support section to report issues.

question: How do I access the leaderboard?
answer: The leaderboard is available on the Results or event details page.

question: Can I participate in multiple events?
answer: Yes, you can register for multiple events if eligible.

question: How do I check my eligibility status?
answer: Your eligibility status is displayed on your dashboard and event registration page.

question: How do I get notifications about upcoming events?
answer: Enable notifications in your profile settings or check the Notifications section.

question: How do I use the platform’s storage service?
answer: Refer to the Storage Service Guide in the documentation section.

question: How do I view my achievements?
answer: Achievements are listed in your user profile and dashboard.

question: How do I update my profile information?
answer: Go to your dashboard and select 'Edit Profile' to update your information.

question: How do I join as a host or institution?
answer: Apply through the Host/Institution registration page and follow the instructions.

question: How do I access event analytics?
answer: Event analytics are available to hosts and institutions on their dashboard.

question: How do I request a certificate re-issue?
answer: Submit a request via the Support or Certificate section in your dashboard.

question: How do I view feedback for events?
answer: Feedback is available on the event details page and your dashboard.

question: How do I manage notifications?
answer: Notification settings can be managed from your profile page.

question: How do I access secure files?
answer: Secure files are available to eligible users via the Secure Files section in your dashboard.

question: How do I check event participation logs?
answer: Participation logs are available in your dashboard under 'Event Participation.'

question: How do I get help with ML features?
answer: Refer to the ML Integration documentation or contact support for assistance.

question: How do I use the API?
answer: API documentation is available in the docs section.

question: How do I view or download certificates?
answer: Certificates can be viewed and downloaded from your dashboard after event completion.

question: How do I check host eligibility status?
answer: Host eligibility status is shown on the host dashboard and event registration page.

question: How do I migrate my account or data?
answer: Migration instructions are available in the documentation or contact support for help.

question: How do I access business analytics?
answer: Business analytics are available to authorized users in the analytics dashboard.

question: How do I validate event modules?
answer: Use the validation scripts provided in the scripts folder or contact support.

question: How do I get started as a new user?
answer: Check the Getting Started guide in the documentation and follow onboarding steps.

question: How do I access the development approach?
answer: Development approach details are available in the DEVELOPMENT_APPROACH.md file.

question: How do I check API endpoints?
answer: API endpoints are documented in the swagger documentation and docs section.

question: How do I use socket features?
answer: Refer to the socketClient.js example in the examples folder.

question: How do I check system status or downtime?
answer: System status updates are posted in the Notifications section and via email.

question: How do I access the platform from mobile?
answer: The platform is mobile-friendly and can be accessed via any browser.

question: How do I get help with frontend issues?
answer: Refer to the Frontend TODO and error documentation or contact support.

question: How do I check my event certificates?
answer: Event certificates are listed in your dashboard under 'Certificates.'

question: How do I get updates about new features?
answer: Updates are announced in the Notifications section and via email.

question: How do I access storage usage details?
answer: Storage usage details are available in your dashboard under 'Storage.'

question: How do I request event verification?
answer: Submit a verification request from the event details page or your dashboard.

question: How do I access institution features?
answer: Institution features are available to registered institutions via their dashboard.

question: How do I check notification history?
answer: Notification history is available in your dashboard under 'Notifications.'

question: How do I access support tickets?
answer: Support tickets can be viewed and managed from your dashboard under 'Support.'
